last_episode_to_air.name: Fair Thee Well Heeled
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Skinnygirl gang has a party; Julie's departure nears; Bethenny and Jason move into their new apartment, but are sent packing again.

name: Bethenny Ever After
overview: Bethenny Ever After, titled Bethenny Getting Married? during season one, is an American reality documentary television series on Bravo. The series focuses on the life of Bethenny Frankel, a former original cast member of The Real Housewives of New York City.

episodes.name: Mi Casa, Su Casa
episodes.overview: In the premiere episode, Bethenny launches the next chapter of her life – marriage and a baby. Bethenny is thrilled to be asked to walk in a fashion show as it gives her the opportunity to show the world her baby bump.

episodes.name: In-laws We Trust
episodes.overview: With her nuptials just around the corner, it’s time for Bethenny to meet with her wedding planner and finally start solidifying plans. Jason’s mom comes to town to help Bethenny shop for wedding dresses.

episodes.name: 88% to a Million
episodes.overview: Bethenny prepares to leave for her combined bachelor and bachelorette party in Atlantic City, but realizes that planning a wedding and keeping her business going is much more hectic and time consuming than she thought.

episodes.name: Let Me Eat Cake!
episodes.overview: Bethenny’s wedding day is approaching and she has many details to take care of including attending her bridal shower hosted by fellow housewife Alex McCord. Panic sets in when Bethenny goes for her final wedding dress fitting and realizes it might be too small by the time she walks down the aisle.

episodes.name: So Hoppy Together
episodes.overview: Bethenny's wedding day has finally arrived, and she is still working on the final touches for her new book. Ever the multi-tasker, Bethenny finishes up her work in time to start getting ready and to greet the revolving door of friends and family.

episodes.name: The Honeymoon Is Over
episodes.overview: With wedding behind them, it's time for Bethenny and Jason to relax and enjoy their honeymoon in St Bart. Anxiety kicks in when the discussion leans towards the pending arrival of the baby. Bethenny promises to keep her hormones in check if Jason can remember to stay calm.

episodes.name: Baby Won't Wait
episodes.overview: With only a few weeks until motherhood, Bethenny realizes she's not fully prepared for the baby's arrival. She completes a crash course in childcare with maternity guru Rosie Pope just as her water breaks - four weeks before her due date!

episodes.name: Bryn Here, Done That
episodes.overview: Bethenny and Jason are thrilled that their new little bundle of joy, Bryn, is happy and healthy. They quickly realize that their lives are about to change dramatically as feedings and diaper changes take priority over everything else.

episodes.name: Getting More Than Married
episodes.overview: Since little Bryn Hoppy decided to come one month early, plans for the baby shower had to be moved. Alex McCord and event planner extraordinaire Shawn Rabideau decide on a beautiful and relaxing New York spa to celebrate.

episodes.name: Lost Footage
episodes.overview: In this special episode we get to see even more Bethenny as she juggles wedding, baby and career all at the same time.

episodes.name: Hoppy Trails to You
episodes.overview: Bethenny and Jason hit the road with their four-month old daughter, Bryn, to visit Jason’s parents in his hometown in rural Pennsylvania. Bethenny experiences a culture shock as she and Jason stroll through the neighborhood and visit with some of Jason’s old classmates.

episodes.name: There Is No Normal
episodes.overview: A magazine hosts a gala honoring Bethenny for her style. Meanwhile, tension develops when Jason suggests visiting his parents again; and the pair set out on a date night.

episodes.name: Business as Usual
episodes.overview: Bethenny's business ventures take an upswing, yet her margarita product isn't progressing fast enough. Bethenny discovers liquor stores are slow to replenish inventory---so she puts Jason on the case to solve the problem.

episodes.name: It's My Baptism and I'll Cry if I Want To
episodes.overview: It's faith overload when Gina takes Bethenny, Jason and Bryn to her Trinidadian church to give Bryn a "blessing." Once the ceremony is underway, Jason and Bethenny suddenly realize it seems much more like a baptism than just a simple blessing.

episodes.name: Ice Castles and Hassles
episodes.overview: Bethenny's 40th birthday party is around the corner and everyone wants to celebrate. After some cajoling by Jason, friends and her former wedding planner Shawn, Bethenny goes against her best instincts and agrees to a party.

episodes.name: Fleeing From 40
episodes.overview: It's a Hoppy birthday for Bethenny---or is it? As her 40th-birthday bash draws near, Bethenny falls victim to blues and blahs, and Jason plans surprises aplenty. On edge, Bethenny distracts herself by practicing for her stint on "Skating With the Stars."

episodes.name: The Mile High Club
episodes.overview: Bethenny anticipates her debut on "Skating With the Stars," yet she feels like she's on thin ice. Her schedule is hectic, Thanksgiving is approaching and she'll be away from baby Bryn for the first time when she visits the Skinny Girl bottling plant.

episodes.name: I Need Some Lovin From My Oven
episodes.overview: Thanksgiving is just days away but Bethenny can't slow down and be thankful yet: her first performance on "Skating with the Stars" is right around the corner.

episodes.name: Don't Get Fat and Bloated
episodes.overview: With Gina now gone, it's time for Bethenny and Jason to find some solid help in the nanny department. They decide on a quiet woman named Dawa who Bethenny later learns was a hairdresser in India.

episodes.name: Thin Ice, Ugly Sweaters
episodes.overview: Much to their surprise, Bethenny and Ethan have death spiraled their way into the finals for Skating With The Stars! But since she is the Queen of Mulit-tasking, Bethenny wants to make sure when Jason comes out to the warm Southern California December air, that they make the most of their family time in California.

episodes.name: Skinny On The Skinny
episodes.overview: Having just finished Skating with the Stars, Bethenny and company have not slowed down for one minute and have now embarked on her Skinnygirl bus tour. Nothing is off limits and Bethenny is not afraid to share.

episodes.name: Mo' Money, Mo' Problems
episodes.overview: It's been a fruitful year for Bethenny but life shows no sign of slowing down. Season 3 kicks off with a party for the first new cocktail since the sale of Skinnygirl -- friends old and new are in attendance.

episodes.name: Alias Benjamin Frankelin
episodes.overview: Bethenny decides to have a good old fashioned girl's weekend in her favorite stomping ground -- Montauk. With Bryn, Dawa and Cookie by her side, Bethenny turns off the world and takes a drive out to the beach.

episodes.name: The Damaged One
episodes.overview: It's back to the beach, this time for another soiree to celebrate Skinnygirl cocktails. Bethenny decides to work on her matchmaking skills, her targets - Julie's sister Jonie and her partner in Skinnygirl Daily Nutrition, Matt.

episodes.name: Shrink Resistant
episodes.overview: The second year of marriage is proving to be more difficult than the first for Bethenny and Jason. Bethenny confides to her hairstylist that she and Jason are in a fight and has been feeling distant from Jason.

episodes.name: Adrift
episodes.overview: Bethenny and Jason sail away on the couple's therapy boating trip, but the tide turns just as they begin to work together. Jason gets seasick and rendered unable to perform his "duty" of cooking the meal for the group.

episodes.name: Maternal Instincts
episodes.overview: Bethenny and Jason are going full steam ahead on the apartment remodel. Closet space is of the utmost importance to Bethenny, but for Bethenny to get her dream closet, Jason must give up his "man cave."

episodes.name: All Da Boats
episodes.overview: One "scandal" after the next has Bethenny making headlines. From the facts in her article in Forbes being questioned to the driver of the tow boat that picked her up after the boat incident claiming she didn't give him a big enough tip, it seems like everyone wants a piece of Bethenny.

episodes.name: Who Coordinates the Chaos
episodes.overview: Bethenny takes a serious hit when her assistant, Julie, delivers big news. Bethenny is full of mixed emotions and it causes her to reflect on her extended family and how valuable they are to her...and what better way to celebrate her staff than to do a photo shoot of them all modeling the Skinnygirl Shapewear line.

episodes.name: My Bad Self
episodes.overview: Bethenny gets busy building her brand empire and in typical Bethenny fashion has found a way to mix business with pleasure. With her staff in tow, the team heads to Jim Bean to discuss some exciting ideas that are brewing with Skinnygirl Cocktails.

episodes.name: Paradise Found
episodes.overview: Bethenny and Jason arrive at the One and Only Pamilla resort in Los Cabos for their extended and much needed vacation. It's been a tough road up until now but with Bryn and Veronica in tow, they are hoping to relax.

episodes.name: Paradise Lost
episodes.overview: A long vacation is just what the doctor ordered for Bethenny and Jason but the ups and downs that come with it are not. On the second leg of their trip, Jason decides that he has waited long enough to break some news about their new apartment and where they may have to live before they can move in.

episodes.name: Grab Your Balloons
episodes.overview: Jason and Bethenny are back in NYC and very much back to the business at hand - getting their apartment renovated and making sure they have a place to sleep.

episodes.name: Aspen-ational
episodes.overview: When Bethenny brings up her obstacles with Jason to Dr. Amador, she understands it's time to take a step back and listen. Soon after, she leaves for the launch of the Skinnygirl Cranberry Cosmo in Aspen.

episodes.name: Unregrettable
episodes.overview: Bethenny must once again face her past when she has dinner with Louis, one of her deceased father's dearest friends.

episodes.name: Fair Thee Well Heeled
episodes.overview: The Skinnygirl gang has a party; Julie's departure nears; Bethenny and Jason move into their new apartment, but are sent packing again.
